content: The artist you are thinking of is Salvador Dali, who is known for his surrealist paintings. One of Dali's most famous works is a painting called "The Persistence of Memory," which depicts melting clocks and other strange objects in a surreal landscape. In the lower left corner of the painting, there is a small gold-framed mirror, and Dali's reflection can be seen in the mirror. The painting was created in 1931 and is now housed in the Museum of Modern Art in New York City. "The Persistence of Memory" is one of Dali's most iconic works and is widely recognized as a masterpiece of surrealist art. I hope this information helps to answer your question!
